text: Livarot-Pays-d'Auge is a commune that is in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the 22 former communes of Livarot (the seat), Auquainville, Les Autels-Saint-Bazile, Bellou, Cerqueux, Cheffreville- Tonnencourt, La Croupte, Familly, Fervaques, Heurtevent, Le Mesnil-Bacley, Le Mesnil-Durand, Le Mesnil-Germain, Meulles, Les Moutiers-Hubert, Notre-Dame-de- Courson, Préaux-Saint-Sébastien, Sainte-Marguerite-des-Loges, Saint-Martin-du- Mesnil-Oury, Saint-Michel-de-Livet, Saint-Ouen-le-Houx and Tortisambert.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Livarot-Pays-d'Auge
